verses.verse: וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char, And afterward בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u went in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and told אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; Pharaoh כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, Let my people וְיָחֹ֥גּוּ <S%H2287><s%> ve-ya-Chog-gu that they may hold a feast לִ֖י li בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. unto me in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Who [is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> 'esh-Ma' that I should obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo, his voice לְשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> le-shal-Lach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; to let Israel לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti ;I know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, not the LORD וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and besides אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El neither will I let Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֲשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H7971><s%> 'a-shal-Le-ach. go

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei The God הָעִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣א <S%H7122><s%> nik-Ra hath met עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu; and נֵ֣לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> Ne-la-chah go נָּ֡א <S%H4994><s%> na Please דֶּרֶךְ֩ <S%H1870><s%> de-reCh journey שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet we pray thee three יָמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar, into the desert וְנִזְבְּחָה֙ <S%H2076><s%> ve-niz-be-Chah and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God פֶּ֨ן־ <S%H6435><s%> Pen- otherwise יִפְגָּעֵ֔נוּ <S%H6293><s%> yif-ga-'E-nu, lest he fall בַּדֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> bad-De-ver upon us with pestilence א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> ve-Cha-rev. or with the sword

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem But מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah why מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto them Wherefore do ye Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron, and Aaron תַּפְרִ֥יעוּ <S%H6544><s%> taf-Ri-'u let אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people מִמַּֽעֲשָׂ֑יו <S%H4639><s%> mi-ma-'a-Sav; act לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu to לְסִבְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5450><s%> le-siv-lo-tei-Chem. you unto your burdens

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> hen- Look רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim now [are] many עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah are now עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am Behold the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְהִשְׁבַּתֶּ֥ם <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Tem and ye make them rest אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מִסִּבְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5450><s%> mis-siv-lo-Tam. from their burdens

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; the same אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנֹּגְשִׂ֣ים <S%H5065><s%> han-no-ge-Sim the taskmasters בָּעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ba-'Am, of the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שֹׁטְרָ֖יו <S%H7860><s%> sho-te-Rav and their officers לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo are no תֹאסִפ֞וּן <S%H3254><s%> to-si-Fun Ye shall no more לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet give תֶּ֧בֶן <S%H8401><s%> Te-ven straw לָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am the people לִלְבֹּ֥ן <S%H3835><s%> lil-Bon to make הַלְּבֵנִ֖ים <S%H3843><s%> hal-le-ve-Nim brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> kit-Mol before שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom; before that time הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> hem themselves יֵֽלְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu, go וְקֹשְׁשׁ֥וּ <S%H7197><s%> ve-ko-she-Shu and gather לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem תֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> Te-ven. straw

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַתְכֹּ֨נֶת <S%H4971><s%> mat-Ko-net And the tale הַלְּבֵנִ֜ים <S%H3843><s%> hal-le-ve-Nim of the bricks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> hem they עֹשִׂ֨ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim which they did make תְּמ֤וֹל <S%H8543><s%> te-Mol before שִׁלְשֹׁם֙ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom before that time תָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ta-Si-mu ye shall lay עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, and לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תִגְרְע֖וּ <S%H1639><s%> tig-re-'U upon them ye shall not diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; any כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because נִרְפִּ֣ים <S%H7503><s%> nir-Pim [ought] thereof for they [be] idle הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, like עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that הֵ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they צֹֽעֲקִים֙ <S%H6817><s%> tzo-'a-Kim therefore they cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <S%H2076><s%> niz-be-Chah [and] sacrifice לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei-nu. to our God

תִּכְבַּ֧ד <S%H3513><s%> tich-Bad be laid הָעֲבֹדָ֛ה <S%H5656><s%> ha-'a-vo-Dah Let there more work עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim the men וְיַעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> ve-ya-'a-su- that they may labour בָ֑הּ Vah; וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- no יִשְׁע֖וּ <S%H8159><s%> yish-'U therein and let them not regard בְּדִבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> be-div-rei- words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. vain

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-Ye-tze-'U went out נֹגְשֵׂ֤י <S%H5065><s%> no-ge-Sei And the taskmasters הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people וְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <S%H7860><s%> ve-Sho-te-Rav, and their officers וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, Pharaoh אֵינֶ֛נִּי <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-ni I am not נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten I will not give לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem תֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> Te-ven. you straw

אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, You לְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu go קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu ye get לָכֶם֙ la-Chem תֶּ֔בֶן <S%H8401><s%> Te-ven, you straw מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> me-'a-Sher where תִּמְצָ֑אוּ <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza-'u; ye can find כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki it yet אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein none נִגְרָ֛ע <S%H1639><s%> nig-Ra' shall be diminished מֵעֲבֹדַתְכֶ֖ם <S%H5656><s%> me-'a-vo-dat-Chem of your work דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. not ought

וַיָּ֥פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> vai-Ya-fetz were scattered abroad הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am So the people בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְקֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H7197><s%> le-ko-Shesh to gather קַ֖שׁ <S%H7179><s%> kash stubble לַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> lat-Te-ven. instead of straw

וְהַנֹּגְשִׂ֖ים <S%H5065><s%> ve-han-no-ge-Sim And the taskmasters אָצִ֣ים <S%H213><s%> 'a-Tzim hasted לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; [them] saying כַּלּ֤וּ <S%H3615><s%> kal-Lu Fulfil מַעֲשֵׂיכֶם֙ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-sei-Chem your works דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- tasks י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom [your] daily בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H3117><s%> be-yo-Mo, daily כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you בִּהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot as when there was הַתֶּֽבֶן׃ <S%H8401><s%> hat-Te-ven. straw

וַיֻּכּ֗וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yuk-Ku, over them were beaten שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <S%H7860><s%> sho-te-Rei And the officers בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom שָׂ֣מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Sa-mu had set עֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-le-Hem, over נֹגְשֵׂ֥י <S%H5065><s%> no-ge-Sei taskmasters פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh which Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; [and] demanded מַדּ֡וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> lo not כִלִּיתֶ֨ם <S%H3615><s%> chil-li-Tem Wherefore have ye not fulfilled חָקְכֶ֤ם <S%H2706><s%> cha-ke-Chem your task לִלְבֹּן֙ <S%H3835><s%> lil-Bon in making brick כִּתְמ֣וֹל <S%H8543><s%> kit-Mol both yesterday שִׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom, before that time גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- either תְּמ֖וֹל <S%H8543><s%> te-Mol yesterday גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- or הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. and to day

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u, came שֹֽׁטְרֵי֙ <S%H7860><s%> sho-te-Rei Then the officers בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'a-Ku and cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תַעֲשֶׂ֦ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh Wherefore dealest כֹ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> choh this לַעֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dei-cha. bondage

תֶּ֗בֶן <S%H8401><s%> Te-ven, There is no straw אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There נִתָּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> nit-Tan given לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, unto thy servants וּלְבֵנִ֛ים <S%H3843><s%> u-le-ve-Nim brick אֹמְרִ֥ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim and they say לָ֖נוּ La-nu עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su; to us Make וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold עֲבָדֶ֛יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha and behold thy servants מֻכִּ֖ים <S%H5221><s%> muk-Kim [are] beaten וְחָטָ֥את <S%H2398><s%> ve-cha-Tat but the fault עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha. [is] in thine own people

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer But he said נִרְפִּ֥ים <S%H7503><s%> nir-Pim Ye [are] idle אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you נִרְפִּ֑ים <S%H7503><s%> nir-Pim; [ye are] idle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, therefore ye say נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah go נִזְבְּחָ֥ה <S%H2076><s%> niz-be-Chah [and] do sacrifice לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. to the LORD
